document.full_text: the hillside slum of "las mayas" provides both great vistas of caracas and an ideal view of a housing crisis shaping into a major battleground for venezuelan president hugo chavez's re-election bid.
document.title: venezuela housing shortage a headache for chavez
lines_and_colors: the hillside slum of "las mayas" provides both great vistas of caracas and an ideal view of a housing crisis shaping into a major battleground for venezuelan president hugo chavez's re-election bid.
